actionConfiguration.body:
select
	retailer_code as company_code,
	retailer_name as Medical_Name,
	contact as Phone_Number,
	remark,
	area as city_name,
	amc,
	status,
	TO_CHAR(install_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS installed_date,
	area_zone,
	to_char(stop_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as stop_date,
	license_days,
	address,
	retailer_temp_id,
	ideal_days,
	status_bucket,
	updated_time,
	updated_agent_id,
	reactivation,
	reactivation_date,
	service_status,
	pincode,
	retailer_gstin,
	retailer_pan,
	retailer_email,
	retailer_gst_applicable,
	installation_amount,
	retailer_type,
	installation_remarks,
	geography,
	last_bucket_time
from
	public.retailer
	where retailer_code = {{retailer_code_select.selectedOptionValue}};
